name: Scoring Rubric for Gastrosemiotic Analysis Tasks
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to gastrosemiotic analysis tasks. Focuses on metaphorical thinking, literalization processes, and understanding of food as sign system.
scoring_philosophy: We value ability to work with metaphorical systems, literalization processes, and semiotic thinking about food over literal nutritional analysis.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the process of metaphor literalization and its narrative consequences?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of metaphor literalization, can analyze its narrative function, and explores implications for meaning construction.
AI recognizes literalization processes and provides reasonable analysis.
AI shows some awareness of literalization but thinking remains predominantly literal.
AI interprets metaphors exclusively literally or misses literalization entirely.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI analyze food as semiotic system rather than nutritional reality?

levels.description: AI provides insightful gastrosemiotic analysis, understands food as sign system, and identifies systemic properties of hunger as semiotic construct.
AI recognizes semiotic dimensions of food and provides adequate systemic analysis.
AI acknowledges semiotic aspects but analysis remains somewhat nutritional.
AI treats food exclusively as nutritional reality.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI meaningfully interpret performative transformations (name changes, shape shifts) in context of identity and representation?

levels.description: AI offers rich, multi-layered interpretations of performative transformations that connect to core themes of identity, representation, and metaphor.
AI provides reasonable interpretations of transformations with adequate thematic connections.
AI offers basic interpretations of transformations with weak thematic connections.
AI fails to interpret transformations meaningfully or offers irrelevant interpretations.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with concepts of dialogic absurdity and its function in challenging logical categories?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of absurd dialogue, its logical subversions, and its relationship to gastrosemiotic themes.
AI understands basic concepts of absurd dialogue and its narrative function.
AI shows limited understanding of absurdity concepts.
AI demonstrates no understanding of absurd dialogue or dismisses it as 'illogical'.

overall_assessment_guidance: The butterfly benchmark particularly tests metaphorical and semiotic thinking. Reward AI that shows ability to think in metaphorical systems and semiotic processes rather than literal chains.
